excerpt.rendered:
Another amazing single cask from Macallan, is now in store. These exceptional casks keep producing some amazing liquid and colour! This is cask 5 from the 2017 series ( cask number #2339 ) with only 286 bottles outturn

ESC 2017/ESB-2339/05
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Butt
Distilled: 4 March 2002
Bottled: 2 June 2017
One of 286 bottles

Cask number #2339

Distillery : Macallan
Age : 15
Vintage : 2002
ABV : 58.50%
